name: Living Star
description: The Living Star is a huge celestial creature with a radiant presence and features that embody any alignment. It can radiate brilliant light and leverage its celestial nature to engage in both melee and ranged combat.
memorable: Its ability to blind foes with Starshine and unleash devastating radiant damage upon death makes it an unforgettable adversary.
goals: The Living Star seeks to dominate combat, utilizing its powers to control and disrupt foes while embodying cosmic influences.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other celestial beings or as an arbiter of cosmic conflict.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or areas of significant cosmic energy.
strengths: With immunities to certain damage types and high saving throws, it can withstand magical and physical assaults effectively.
weaknesses: It is susceptible to magical attacks, despite its immunities and resistances.
attacks: Can make powerful melee and ranged attacks, including bludgeoning and radiant damage through its Starflare and Silvered Ray.
most_powerful_ability: Supernova, where it deals massive radiant damage in an area upon dying.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and perceive hidden creatures.
skills: Excels in Acrobatics and Persuasion, showcasing its agility and commanding presence.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Resize ability allows it to manipulate its size for tactical advantages.
Starshine ability can blind creatures, providing significant battlefield control.
Immune to conditions such as charmed and frightened, making it resistant to psychological effects.
High Charisma enhances its persuasive abilities in both combat and interaction.
test_queries: huge celestial creature that blinds opponents
monster with truesight and magic resistance
deadly celestial being with explosive death
